demos.input: {"text":"\t<Forwarded from 448712404000>Please CALL 08712404000 immediately as there is an urgent message waiting for you."}
{"text":"HMV BONUS SPECIAL 500 pounds of genuine HMV vouchers to be won. Just answer 4 easy questions. Send HMV to 86688 More info:www.100percent-real.com"}
{"text":"Good. do you think you could send me some pix? I would love to see your top and bottom..."}
{"text":"Good Morning plz call me sir..I have an urgent work.."}
{"text":"Noida Commercial Wave Sec-18  Silver @ 11500/- PSF  Gold @ 12500/- PSF,  Logix Sec-124 @ 8200/- PSF For Best Deal Call 9711131802 /3"}
{"text":"Jane babes not goin 2 wrk, feel ill after lst nite. Foned in already cover 4 me chuck.:-)"}
{"text":"Ok lor. Anyway i thk we cant get tickets now cos like quite late already. U wan 2 go look 4 ur frens a not? Darren is wif them now..."}

signature.instructions:
Given an SMS text, predict whether it is ham, spam, or smishing.
Output only the predicted label.
